plot: Madoka an energetic school girl is recruited by a mysterious girl called Lan to pilot a robot in order to protect her city from enemies from space with an as of yet unknown goal.
plot_en: Madoka an energetic school girl is recruited by a mysterious girl called Lan to pilot a robot in order to protect her city from enemies from space with an as of yet unknown goal.

title: Rinne no Lagrange
